T02D3782:222b-1: panytsa th'a ga ta mam ga la g'a th'a /
T02D3782:222b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa /
T02D3782:222b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3782:222b-5: rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan //
T02D3782:222b-6: zla ba nya 'dra'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin pa //
T02D3782:222b-7: dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02D3782:222b-8: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byad
T02D3782:222b-9: shog / mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug
T02D3782:222b-10: rnam sbyong ba // mgon po yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas bkra shis pa //
T02D3782:222b-11: dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02D3782:222b-12: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /
T02D3782:223a-0: @223a * // sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis rgyan mdzad cing //
T02D3782:223a-1: yang dag bden pa'i 'byor pa sbyin mdzad mi slu ba //
T02D3782:223a-2: rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02D3782:223a-3: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02D3782:223a-4: bsam gtan ting 'dzin ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i gnas //
T02D3782:223a-5: ye shes padma'i steng bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan zhing //
T02D3782:223a-6: tshe grangs med par byin gyis rlob pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02D3782:223a-7: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
T02D3782:223a-8: shog / sems can don gyi las la thugs ni
T02D3782:223a-9: sbyor mdzad cing // 'gro ba kun gyi 'ching ba'i bcings las grol mdzad pa //
T02D3782:223a-10: thub mchog don yod grub pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02D3782:223a-11: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
T02D3782:223a-12: shog / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs
